General.Name: KORE Mining Ltd
General.Description: KORE Mining Ltd. engages in the exploration and development of mineral resource properties. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. It owns 100% interest in the Imperial project located in Imperial County, southeastern California; and the Long Valley gold development project located in Mono County, east-central California. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2E9

1.Name: Mr. Anil  Jiwani C.A., CPA, CPA
